abstracts.cdata!:
The Roseires Irrigation Project in Sudan
            will provide a loan to finance the foreign exchange cost of
            construction of a dam 60 meters in height on the Blue Nile
            near Roseires, and the necessary works to regulate the
            release of stored water. This project will consist of; a)
            conversion of restricted pump schemes to unrestricted
            pumping; b) intensification of cropping in the Gezira area;
            c) extension of the Gezira-Managil area; d) increasing
            supplies for existing pumping schemes; e) expansion of sugar
            cane production in the Guneid area. The increased storage
            following construction of the Roseires dam will allow the
            expansion of irrigated agricultural production for local and
            export markets. See report no. PID2
